bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Filed Oct. 1887 HM Sutton. Clerk By JJ Hethen. Deputy
In the District Court at Montesano Terry. of Washington vs. Gus Bendjus et al.

This application calling on for a reduction of Bail, and in being apperant that Defts cannot give the amount here-upon and considering the great expense thereby about to be improved on the County. The amount having become a lesser amount of bail will be as effectual & be to better effect on above.

Therefore it is ordered that the bail herebefore filed be reducted to 400$ for each of the accused now under arrest, the the three charges in each one's case and upon good being given by each of said parties at the sum of $400 - said parties to be released the next term of court.
